title: We're going full circle
body:
I don't want to hear anyone complain about:

- Bot lane dominating the meta

- Marksmen being mandatory gods of the game

- It being Riot's fault that marksmen are too strong in season 9

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/oA7EoIrf-crit-item-explorations?show=flat&comment=003a0001

We're literally going back to a time where marksmen blew up squishies with burst on crits by the look of it, due to "community outcry" about lacking satisfaction when not dps'ing tanks (which is what everyone was saying marksmen should do JUST LAST YEAR). Whatever happens with marksmen in season 9, just note that this is a community-driven change, and I'm gonna be flaming the ever-lasting fuck out of everyone on these boards that complains when bot lane becomes high priority again.

That was the last buzzword people were using in late season 7 and early season 8 to chastise Riot for marksmen hitting divers and assassins too hard. They'd say that marksmen would use "burst per second" to out-burst and out-dps assassins, so assassins couldn't do their jobs of killing marksmen.

Now we're going BACK to bps'ing assassins because it "feels better". Not even because crit is ACTUALLY weak (Sivir and Xayah, and Lucian building RFC + IE as 3rd and 4th items shows that crit was still useful as a mid/late game option when you're playing League and not solo queue'ing), but just because it "feels bad". If you HONESTLY think that Riot's going to find a middle ground between marksmen power levels in the game and everyone else's **while also** making it so marksmen feel good to play, you're mistaken...horribly.

I want Riot to nerf damage everywhere else to acceptable levels that feel good on a case by case basis. ADCs aren't weak, it's that everyone is camping bot lane because double the people to farm gold off of. It's why I like top lane tbh, an island of solidarity where (usually) the only thing deciding the lane is the player's skill. I feel bad for ADC players. Don't change crit items yet, try something else first.

Bot lane is already high priority, that's why it feels shit to play an ADC that isn't Lucian or Jhin. Lowering damage everywhere else is the answer and will solve a lot more lasting effects.

I wish they would just stop trying to implement new ideas and fix their old ones. No one asked to change crit items, but they went ahead and did that and now marksmen really suck.
